Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19778602]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC25923 (MIC=9.38 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=21.88 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli ML-35P (MIC=37.50 µg/ml);Yeast:Candida albicans ATCC2002 (MIC=32.74 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref:19778602]22.49 ± 4.8% hemolytic activity at 100 µg/ml against rabbit red cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial and antifungal activity. Also has hemolytic activity against rabbit red cells.

Literature.Title: Peptidomics and genomics analysis of novel antimicrobial peptides from the frog, Rana nigrovittata.
Literature.Author: Ma Y, Liu C, Liu X, Wu J, Yang H, Wang Y, Li J, Yu H, Lai R.
